categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: In 25 ABY, during the Yuuzhan Vong War between the New Republic and the Yuuzhan Vong species, a skirmish occurred above the planet Sriluur. While travelling to Hutt Space in their search of Droma's family, Han Solo and Droma were attacked by a group of coralskippers. They managed to destroy most of them, forcing the remaining ones to retreat. However, the Millennium Falcon was damaged and the duo renounced to reach Nar Shaddaa.
